articles.title: South Boston St. Patrick’s Parade to follow new route for 250th Evacuation Day
articles.description:
Organizers say the change honors Henry Knox’s historic march and will help manage larger crowds.

The post South Boston St. Patrick’s Parade to follow new route for 250th Evacuation Day appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: South Boston St. Patrick’s Parade will follow a new route on March 18, 2026.
Change honors Henry Knox’s historic march during the 250th Evacuation Day celebration.
New route aims to better manage larger crowds expected for the event.

articles.title: New England has the best open-air and maritime museums in America, according to USA Today readers
articles.description:
Three Massachusetts museums were recognized for their excellence.

summary: Three Massachusetts museums recognized for excellence by USA Today readers.
Massachusetts ranks among the best for open-air and maritime museums in America.
Local tourism expected to boost as residents explore these acclaimed attractions.

articles.title: Second worker exposed to gas at Maine pulp mill dies
articles.description:
Allen Hornberger, 26, had been hospitalized for nearly three weeks after the Jan. 27 incident at the Baileyville plant.

The post Second worker exposed to gas at Maine pulp mill dies appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Allen Hornberger, 26, died after a gas exposure incident at a Maine pulp mill.
He had been hospitalized for nearly three weeks following the January 27 incident.
This tragedy raises concerns about workplace safety for Boston-area workers.

articles.title: Warriors’ Stephen Curry to miss Thursday’s game against the Celtics
articles.description:
Curry, who has been dealing with pain and swelling in his knee, will sit out against Boston.

The post Warriors’ Stephen Curry to miss Thursday’s game against the Celtics appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Warriors' Stephen Curry will miss Thursday's game against the Celtics due to knee issues.
Curry has been experiencing pain and swelling in his knee, affecting his availability.
His absence could impact the Celtics' chances of winning at home on February 19.

articles.title: Local obituary: Bob Aliano, worked as a Roslindale barber for 67 years
articles.description:
"A staple of our community, Bob will be missed by the countless friends and loyal customers he made at The Rialto Barber Shop, where he worked faithfully since 1959."

The post Local obituary: Bob Aliano, worked as a Roslindale barber for 67 years appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bob Aliano passed away, leaving a legacy in Roslindale as a barber since 1959.
He served the community for 67 years at The Rialto Barber Shop.
His absence will be felt by countless loyal customers and friends in the area.

summary: Caleb Durbin attributes his fielding skills to his wrestling background.

His unique athleticism may improve game performance for Boston fans.
